review.comment: I was introduced to Meals by Chef B from my local gym and I must say I am so happy I was!  I have not been disappointed once by any of the meals I have received.  The food is fresh, delicious and there is a new list of specials each week that are always amazing.  The variety of options is a huge plus for my family.  This is by far the best company I have purchased pre-made meals from.
review.review_reply: Thank you Jen for giving us a shot! We are honored to serve you and your family and appreciate your business!

review.comment: The meals that Chef B and Staff provide have helped me significantly!! As a full time physician working in these conditions the last thing I had time was cooking healthy meals. Time was not on my side. Now.. my family of four looks forward to dinner. Delicious and healthy AND affordable!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Anita! This means a lot to us to hear that we are making life easier and more delicious! We appreciate your weekly business as much as you appreciate us!

review.comment: Chef B makes life a lot easier! Food is fresh and healthy!
review.review_reply: Thank you Debbie! We are so happy you are enjoying everything!

review.comment: Hands down the best-tasting meal delivery service we’ve ever had, and we’ve had A. LOT. The flavors were magnificent; the quality was perfection, and the meal choices?! *chef’s kiss* Thank you for being such a fantastic customer-friendly business - looking forward to Sunday already :)
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Tori!  This means so much to Chef Bryan!

review.comment:
Can I give 10 stars??

I was recommended the meal service by Chef B my colleagues who have an had excellent experience with them.

My husband and I have been ordering from them for 3 weeks now and it makes our lives so much easier. We have loved pretty much every meal.

We love to cook but just lack the time and energy, and with the pandemic we try not to go to the grocery stores as often so we can't always have fresh produce to cook with. We ended up eating out at restaurants multiple meals a day and spending a ton of money. We started ordering from Chef B's. They offer large portions and most meals are pretty healthy (even if we have a semi-unhealthy meal, it's still better than what we were eating before!). We have ordered breakfast, snacks and dinner. We like the dinners the most, and I order some lunch portions for lunch or sometimes order dinner to split into lunch and dinner because they are so big.

Delivery occurs Sundays, usually first thing in the morning for us. We haven't had an issue with any order so far.

Thank you so much Chef B for making our lives so much easier!
review.review_reply: Awww thank you so much! We are happy you are happy!

review.comment: I absolutley love everything we have tried by the chef and have even turned a couple friends on to it. I have been doing keto on and off for years and the preparation is what always makes me give up. I'm the worst!  Getting delicious keto meals by Chef B makes it so much easier to follow my nutrition goals and stay on track! My 4 year old also loves the kids meals too. I'm so thankful I found Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you Melinda!!! We are so happy to make life easier and more tasteful!!!! We appreciate your ongoing business!

review.comment: I am at a place where I really don’t have time ( or energy ☺️) to cook meals. I’ve been looking around for a about a year for a place that could relieve me of this responsibility and finally came across Meals By Chef B. The food is delicious! There are so many choices!! They deliver to my house and they are exceptionally nice! I’m picky and I could not recommend them more.
review.review_reply: Yay! We are always thrilled when we make lives easier and you enjoy our service! Thank you so much for your business!

review.comment: The meals are delicious! The Chef is creative and there are new items on the menu every week. Our favorites are the Angus Steak Sliders, the Meat Loaf and the Pork with Garlic butter.
review.review_reply: Thank you Louise! We truly appreciate your business!

review.comment: I found Chef B almost a month ago and it has been a game changer. I have tried a few meal prep services and none compare. The food is so flavorful and perfect portions. I am using Chef B to lose the baby weight and, along with exercising daily, I am down almost 13 pounds!! I am so happy I found Meals by Chef B
We’ve ordered for a few weeks now and have absolutely loved every single thing! Plus it makes my life that much easier!! Huge fan 😊
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Bari! We are all about making lives easier with good food!

review.comment:
We are so busy working, we have very little time to cook .  We have been ordering these meals for quite some time.!!! Absolutely delicious!!!
Last week we ordered the Chefs Pad Thai.... It was the best pad Thai I have ever had in my life!!!   Love you guys so much!! Special shout out to my delivery person Debbie!!  Always has a smile on her face !!! What a delight!!
review.review_reply: So happy to hear we are able to make your week easier!! Thank you so much for your business! 🙏🏼
Thank you Fawn!

review.comment: Chef B has truly enhanced our lives.  Both of us working and neither one feels like cooking.  Which meant, calling out for fast food and you know what happens!  We are now eating fresh, flavorful (the sauces are so so good) dinners.  My husband's blood sugar (he's a diabetic) has stabilized to a consistent number and I've lost just about 15 lbs.  All meals show the nutritional label which makes smart choices so easy.  But there is the macaroni and cheese that I would love to try....maybe after another 10 lbs, I'll go for it.  I cannot say enough good things about this new find.  We've been ordering 6 meals a week for about 10 weeks now.  And another thing, we look so forward to see what is new on the menu each week.  They have taken care of ease, flavor, nutrition and variety and I know there is much more.  We love Chef B's!!
review.review_reply: Hi Linda! Thank you so much for this review. We LOVE when we positively impact lives. It makes this all worth it! We truly appreciate you and your husbands business! I’m so happy he’s feeling well and you are losing the weight you wanted!!! Thank you!!

review.comment: Always delish food and the best customer support!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We appreciate your business!

review.comment: Best pre cooked food delivery service out there! I've tried other services in the past, but ChefB beats them all. They are a little more pricey then their competitors but definitely worth it for the quality, flavor and portion of the food. They list their Macros on their food/website, which is great when trying to count Macros, and their portion size fits the description... when they say you get 8oz of steak... you get 8oz of steak (I weighed it myself). I typically get 2 Dinner portions for an entire day of eating, and my girlfriend can make 1 dinner portion last 2-3 days. Another great thing is that they change their menu every week with many options to choose from.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!!! We are so happy you and your girlfriend are enjoying it and appreciate the value we offer! Thank you for taking the time to write this! 🙏🏼

review.comment: It’s very difficult to find a home chef who knows what special tastes everyone likes. Bryan had me figured out just by talking to me. Perfect meals the way I like it. Good size portions, fresh, delivered in a timely fashion. Why do I need to wait in a restaurant and get  served by someone who doesn’t know me? I do not like waiting to get seated especially during snowbird season where the wait can be almost an hour. Chef B meals change by the week and the way he adds his special touch is unreal. After workouts and a shower I go to the refrigerator and get my gourmet healthy meal.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are so happy to solve a problem for you!

review.comment:
Meals by Chef B, recently prepared the most amazing hors-d’oeuvres for our beautiful wedding. The comments from our guests were all outstanding! We had a mixture of seafood, chicken, beef and veggies that were seasoned unbelievably! The fruit to go with our cake table was the freshest ever!  No one went home hungry!
We can’t wait to use Chef B for our next gathering, and be amazed by his incredible talent of taste and presentation. Thanks again Chef B, and to your amazing friendly staff!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Betz! It was truly our pleasure to serve you and your guests! What a beautiful day!

review.comment: Absolutely amazing and fresh food! The BEST food home delivery service in PBC!
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We are so excited to have you!!

review.comment: Get ready to be amazed!!!!The food came fast, fresh, and flavorful! I ordered the keto meals and desserts. It was really hard to find a company that offered keto meals without added sugar and preservatives in my area but I was lucky enough to find this company on google. It has been like having my very own personalized chef in my kitchen! The meals are priced fair for the food quality and gourmet options. Not to mention the customer service has been excellent as well.  I would highly recommend to friends, family, and anyone looking  for help to improve their eating habits :)
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you Christine! We are thrilled we impacted you like this. Thank you so much for giving us a shot! We are excited to serve you! Welcome to our Chef B family!

review.comment:
We have tried a few other meal delivery services in the past and we have never found one we can order consistently and be happy with. Then we found Chef B!

We are 'foodies' and we are so impressed with the quality, variety and flavors each week. Not only is it convenient but we truly look forward to our meals. The delivery service is consistent and reliable. I would highly recommended Meals by Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jennifer! We appreciate your business just as much! Thank you for your ongoing support!!

review.comment: Meals by Chef B is a great place to get your meals. We have been using them for the last four months. The food is delicious, the presentation is appetizing and the service is great. They go out of their way to remember your allergies, your preferences and anything that will make your dinners special.  There are many choices for meals and the specials are really special. We are so grateful that our daughter recommended them to us. The last four months have provided us with great dinners perfectly prepared.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are honored to serve you! We are so grateful for your weekly business!

review.comment: Our first experience with Chef B and it is excellent!!!!  Even got a little fruit salad as compliments from the chef. Food is great and service has been outstanding.
review.review_reply:
Hi Tamara!!
Thank you so much!! We are so grateful for your business! Enjoy and stay safe!

review.comment: Best food!  We order every week and every meal is better than the last. All special dietary requests honored. Way better than take out from any restaurant!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Richard! We really appreciate you writing this and above all appreciate your loyal business! It’s our pleasure to serve you!!
Thank you!! We appreciate your business Jennifer!

review.comment:
The food is super.  I enjoy every meal I order.

There have been times I “thought” I placed my order when in reality, I forgot to send it in.  I’ve never been left hungry.  Mandi and Chef have send food to me as they know that I especially enjoy fish.

You’ll be happy with your meals if you order Chef’s menus.

Thank you wonderful people.
review.review_reply: Thank you! It’s truly our pleasure! Our clients all become family. We are grateful for your business and are happy to take care of you!

review.comment: So happy that Chef B is delivering to Palm Beach Gardens. My husband had the sausage with peppers and onions tonight. He said it was better than any Italian restaurant! Hope it's on the menu next week so he can have his favorite for Father's Day! I loved the grilled vegetables and used them with several meals this week. Wish they delivered to Chicago as my daughter would love to have healthy and delicious meals for her family and they have nothing like Chef B in Chicago!
review.review_reply: Thank you Jane! Yes! Sausage is on the menu next week!! We appreciate the time you took to share your great experience thus far!

review.comment: I am a Pescatarian and I am blown away by the amazing fish, seafood and vegetarian options available from Chef B. The dishes are so yummy and creative. I look forward to ordering and receiving my meals each week. The protein balls are a must have too! Thank you Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you Sarah!!! We are so happy we are able to accommodate your needs and make you super happy doing it!!! Thank you for referring your mom. We love and appreciate referrals!

review.comment: Meals are tasty and their customer service is excellent.  They added an ingredient I am allergic to and had specified to one of my meals by accident.  I called and they discounted that meal from my total cost right away.  Good portions.
review.review_reply: Thank you Lizette! Our pleasure! Thank you for being so sweet and understanding!

review.comment: Great variety.  Excellent quality.  Reasonably priced.  Professional service.
review.review_reply: Hi Gary, Thank you! We are so glad you are a client! Happy to serve you!

review.comment:
Glad I found Chef B. This was my first time ordering from a home meal delivery service and I was very impressed. The Chicken Parm was delicious and the portions were huge. If I were to cook it at home, I would end up spending more money on ingredients than it cost me to order it from Chef B. I think the Chicken Parm was $14 for the dinner portion and it was enough to completely fill 2 people. Same with the korean chicken thighs... it fed 2 of us and I still had leftovers for a snack.
I can see this as a good alternative to take out and I don't have the skill set or desire to prepare meals of this caliber. 5 stars! Will order again next week.
review.review_reply: WOW! Thank you Matt! We really appreciate your business and you taking the time to write this. We take pride on a few factors and value is definitely one of them! Thank you!!

review.comment: Delicious!!! Freshest home delivery food ever!!! Chef B cooks everything to perfection! Try it , you won't be disappointed!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Cindy!! He loves what he does!! So glad you see his passion through his work!

review.comment: All 12 meals were fresh and tasted fantastic. Great delivery service and customer service. I highly recommend Meals by Chef B. Ordered again and will continue.
this is my 5th week enjoying chef-b menu of good food. i am the only one cooking so my limited menu was very disappointing.Thank you chef-b making eating time so much better

Cant believe we can get gourmet food delivered when I first moved here I couldn't even get a pizza!! Food is delicious everything we tried is great. Portions are generous and its made my life during this time so much easier. I sent my Mom 2 dinners for Mothers day and she loved it! Thanks Chef B.
review.review_reply: We are so happy you found us! Loxahatchee should be spoiled too!!! We are grateful for your business!!

review.comment: The BEST food in Palm Beach! The salads are so fresh! Almost everything we have tried has been perfect! The food is fantastic and our delivery person is so nice!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We love that you have experienced our great food and customer service! That’s our goal!

review.comment: I absolutely LOVE Chef B!! He has been a lifesaver during Covid-19 as I am an essential worker and have had no time to cook for my family at home. His food is always 5++ star and so tasty, fresh and yummy for all of us at home. I am a forever customer! Thank you Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Bonnie!!! We love serving you!!

review.comment: We began ordering meals from Chef B several weeks ago and, thus far, we have been very happy with the meals we've tried.  Their service, presentation, and food quality are all excellent!  We recommend their service to other families without hesitation.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are happy to serve your family!

review.comment: It is super East to order off their online menu.  It’s very seamless and easy. Deliveries are always prompt and the food is DELISH!
review.review_reply: Thank you Gary!! We try our best!!

review.comment: Chef B is truly a blessing.  Being able to order meals with confidence that they will be delicious means a lot.  The portions are substantial and sometimes we even have leftovers.  Every week there are new additions too.    I would highly recommend the service.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!! We are so glad you’re enjoying our service!

review.comment: WOW!! I have tried many food delivery services and have to tell you Meals by Chef B is by far the best. The best tasting food - restaurant quality - awesome selection - and outstanding customer service!!! Check it out it won't disappoint.....
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!!! We truly appreciate you!! So happy you’re hooked! ;)

review.comment:
I won a gift certificate from Chef B at a Hadassah fundraising event.
I decided to try them when I stopped going to stores because of the pandemic.
Yesterday I placed my fourth order.
The food is sooooo good, flavorful, and beautifully packaged with directions for the microwave.
We have tried many different items and have never been disappointed. There is so much to choose from.
Portions are great, prices are reasonable, and the food  is much better than restaurants!!
The chef also makes fabulous desserts.
The delivery is great as well!!
I am happy to support this wonderful small, local business!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are so grateful to have you as a client now! Thank you for being a supporter and fan!!

review.comment: I was so happy to find this cooking alternative during our quarantine time! Everything was delicious.. we all got to eat what we love from vegetarian to steak and seafood. The quality and taste is excellent.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Monica! We appreciate your business!!!

review.comment: My husband and I have been ordering for the last month or so. Every meal we've ordered has been amazing and satisfying while also allowing us to keep to our fitness and nutrition goals. I'm sol glad I found Chef B!!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!   We truly appreciate your business!

review.comment: I'm very impressed by the quality of meals that Chef B delivers. They have a good variety of food that tastes great. I have used another local service (ideal) and the taste and quality was not even close to Chef B.
review.review_reply: Awesome!! Thank you so much! We are happy to serve you!

review.comment: It is rare to find meals that both my husband and I love. Food is delicious   (and there is something for everyone).  Also a great selection, with new items added weekly so you don't get bored. Highly  recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you Valerie!!! We are so happy your husband and you love it!! We truly value your weekly business!

review.comment: Portion sizes are great real value for your money!  Make sure you order enough if you have kids! Food is great and pulled pork is our family's favorite..New creations each week and Chef B is very accommodating with special requests .!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!! We appreciate your business Alison!!!!

review.comment: Hands down the best meal prep service available. Everything is fresh and taste great!  Highly recommend, you won’t be disappointed!
review.review_reply: Thank you Aimee!!!! We truly appreciate your business!

review.comment: I have tried any number of meal delivery services.  Meals By Chef B is the best so far.  The meals are delicious and flavorful. No bland tasteless dishes. Unlike some other plans, you have the choice of old favorites and new selections each week to choose between.  You can personalize keto choices or other diet plans, or just go with what you like.  You can order as many meals as you want as opposed to committing to a set number each week.  I also love the fact that you can order lunch size portions or dinner portions and even kids meals. You can also change some sides or choose zoodles instead of noodles with some dishes.  The flexibility is a wonderful feature of Chef B's which I have not found with other meal plans. Meals are delivered fresh weekly by a friendly delivery person.  This plan has the most variety, the best value and tasty variety.  I'm hooked!
review.review_reply: Thank you Gale!! We appreciate your weekly business!! You’re a pleasure to serve!

review.comment: The meals are top quality,taste, and full of flavor. The best food delivery service I have tried in the past five years. This is my third company I tried and I wish I would have found them earlier. Job well done chef b
review.review_reply: Thank you so much David! We truly appreciate your business!!!
